title: Hakoniwa no Yakujutsushi: Kamisama ni Aisare Joshi no Isekai Seikatsu
original_name: 箱庭の薬術師 神様に愛され女子の異世界生活
sinopse:
‌In‌ ‌order‌ ‌to‌ ‌save‌ ‌her‌ ‌younger‌ ‌sister,‌ ‌Hinami Kusugi‌ ‌has‌ ‌reincarnated‌ ‌into‌ ‌a‌ ‌different‌ ‌world.‌ ‌Although‌ ‌she‌ ‌isn't able to‌ ‌fight‌ ‌with‌ demons,‌ ‌God‌ ‌has‌ given‌ ‌her the skill‌ ‌to‌ ‌mass‌-produce potions. ‌While enjoying‌ ‌her‌ ‌life‌ ‌in‌ ‌a‌ ‌different‌ ‌world,‌ ‌she‌ remains ‌unaware‌ ‌of the problems ‌‌the‌ ‌world‌ around her ‌is‌ ‌experiencing.‌

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
